content: murphy cowl materials needed worsted weight or dk weight yarn- i used 240 yds of mountain colors twizzlefoot in scarletberry 6 5mm crochet hook or size to meet gauge although gauge isn t super important but using a smaller hook or having more row and stitches in your 4x4in swatch will result in a smaller finished product stitch markers finishing needle for weaving in ends pattern notes pattern is worked in row until row 22 and then it is joined to the chain 3 turning chain with a slipstitch chain 3 does count at first stitch the last stitch up until row 22 is always worked into the top of the chain 3 turning chain first stitch on all row before joining start in the same stitch as the chain 3 copyright © by pixie hollow yarn designs 2020 please do not alter this pattern or share as your own please credit pixie hollow yarn designs as the creator of this pattern when possible while working in row you will increase in the first stitch corner space and last stitch once it is joined you will only be increasing in the corner/center stitch stitch abbreviations/special stitches used chain - chain double_crochet- double_crochet fpdc- front post double_crochet bpdc- back post double_crochet sl puff- slanted puff cs- corner stitch yo- yarn over slip_stitch- slipstitch corner stitch- double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet slanted puff- yarn over and insert hook around stem of last double_crochet worked from right to left yarn over pull up a loop through three times in same place yarn over pull through first six loops on hook yarn over and pull through both loops on hook gauge- 4 inches x 4 inches = 8 row of double_crochet and 13 double_crochet stitches pattern row 1- chain 4 in furthest chain from the hook- double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet chain 3 turn 6 double_crochet and a chain 2 space row 2- double_crochet in first stitch double_crochet in next 2 stitches cs double_crochet in next 2 stitches 2 double_crochet in last stitch chain 3 turn 10 double_crochet and a chain 2 space row 3- double_crochet in first stitch fpdc in next 4 stitches cs fpdc in next 4 stitches 2 double_crochet in last stitch chain 3 turn 6 double_crochet 8 fpdc and a chain 2 space copyright © by pixie hollow yarn designs 2020 please do not alter this pattern or share as your own please credit pixie hollow yarn designs as the creator of this pattern when possible row 4- double_crochet in first stitch double_crochet in the next 6 stitches cs double_crochet in next 6 stitches 2 double_crochet in the last stitch chain 3 turn 18 double_crochet and a chain 2 space row 5- double_crochet in first stitch fpdc in the next 8 stitches cs fpdc in next 8 stitches 2 double_crochet in last stitch chain 3 turn 6 double_crochet 16 fpdc and a chain 2 space row 6- double_crochet in first stitch double_crochet in next 10 stitches cs double_crochet in
